name: Star Loop Anomaly
description:
Star Loop Anomaly is a game where three characters are stuck in a space station two minutes before it blows up. Is up to you to control these characters and ensure their survival through this puzzle riddled space station. 

Strategy and time management will be crucial in order to succeed! No matter how many tries it takes remember time is a construct and you should always rely and cooperate with your friends or ... yourself? 

Design and Animations by Lorena Barrán.

Programming and Backgrounds by Diego Edelman. 

Music by Federico Pirez.
